name: Santa's Xmas Caper
description:
Despite being published by the same company and sharing the same title, Santa's Xmas Caper on the Amiga is different from its 8-bit cousins. Instead of a scrolling shoot 'em up, it is a platform game.

While riding on his slide, Santa loses all his pressies. The gifts scattered all across the country, Santa must traverse multiple-scrolling platform-levels collecting them back. When they are all collected, an exit opens granting him access to the next level. Each level is crowded with spiky pitfalls, slippery platforms and cute-looking but nasty baddies. By throwing snowballs, the baddies can be stunned for a short while. Complete all seven levels and Christmas will be saved.

shot.caption: Santa has to negotiate the level and pick up gifts.
You can throw snowballs to freeze obstacles in your path.
